cards.name: Prince of Dawn

effect.command: Deal damage to the opposing minion equal to the number of cards in its /ancestry/.

cards.flavor: The formidable prince whose technique has proven lethal.

cards.name: Balista

effect.command: Deals 2 damage to the opposing minion. If this minion is at the outer ranks, deal 2 damage to the minion adjacet to the opposing minion.
effect.switch: If switching to an outer rank, deal 2 damage to itself.

cards.flavor: A heavy machinery capable of decapacitation, if it hits its mark.

cards.name: Quartermaster

effect.trait: If this minion is on the outer ranks, whenever a friendly minion activates a /Command/ effect, activate this minion's /Command/ effect.
effect.switch: After switching, activates the /Command/ effect of the minion it switches with.

cards.flavor: A master strategist with a mean swing.

cards.name: Mounted Warbeast

effect.command: Deal 2 damage to minions adjacent to the opposing minion.

cards.flavor: Tamed rhinos has proven to be untamed.

cards.name: Flagbearer Noah

effect.trait: Whenever a friendly minion is about to take damage, activate the /Command/ effect of this minion, and change the damaging target to this minion.

cards.flavor: A man of faith among the bloodied hands.

effect.trait: Whenever this minion is targeted for a /Command/ effect, deal 2 damage to itself.
effect.ancestor: Whenever this minion activates its /Command/ effect, deal 2 damage to the opposing minion.

cards.name: Commander

effect.command: Deal 1 damage to the opposing minion, then activate the /Command/ effect of the minion on the right, and then the minion on the left.

cards.flavor: He's the commander. You know the rest.

cards.name: Heavy Arms

effect.trait: Any damage this minion receives will be reduced by 2.
effect.ancestor: Whenever this minion activates a /Command/ effect, deal 2 damage to itself.

cards.flavor: His gigantic shield can sometimes be a burden.

cards.name: Berserker

effect.command: Deal 3 damage to the opposing minion, and then deal 2 damage to itself.
effect.ancestor: Whenever this minion activates a /Command/ effect, deal 2 damage to itself and reshuffle this card.

cards.flavor: Maybe the crusader has ran out of manpower if they need to put this guy in their ranks.

cards.name: Golden Wings

effect.hex: You can choose to put the top card of this minion's /ancestry/ over this minion (and become the minion). No /Hex/ effect is activated.
effect.ancestor: When this minion is going to take damage, you can reshuffle this card, then reduce the damage taken to 0.

cards.flavor: Any man with wings is no longer a man.

boss.name: Zavalion
boss.summon: When 3 or more /Command/ effects are triggered in within one action (chain), summon on any minion.
boss.return: Whenever this minion takes any damage.

effect.command: Deal 2 damage to the opposing minion.
effect.trait: Whenever a /Command/ effect is activated anywhere, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
